title: Travel Essentials Kit - All-in-One Compact Set with Sleep Mask, Nail Care, Skin Care, Toothbrush, Soap Strips & More – Perfect for Travel, Work, Study, & On-the-Go Hygiene - Portable & Convenient
features: 3D Blackout Sleep Mask – Soft, comfortable, ergonomic design, hypoallergenic, fragrance-free. Dimensions: 21 cm x 8 cm (8.27 in x 3.15 in).
3 Pcs Disposable Toilet Seat Covers – Waterproof, hygienic, ideal for public restrooms.
30ml Mini Bottle – Perfect for shampoo or any liquid, compact and reusable.
2 Disposable Compressed Towels - Unscented, alcohol-free, expands with water to 20 cm x 22 cm (7.8 in x 8.66 in).
Portable Toothbrush Set – Includes folding toothbrush, 2 pcs fruit-flavored floss (grapefruit & grape), and Skynlab premium herbal toothpaste (12g).
Mini Pill Case – Compact, portable, and ideal for organising your daily medications.
description: Product description Stay fresh and organised on the go with this all-in-one travel kit. It includes a 3D blackout sleeping mask, disposable toilet seat covers, skincare, nail care tools, and more - all neatly packed in a compact mesh storage bag. Perfect for travel, work, or study, this kit has everything you need to stay comfortable and refreshed wherever you are. Mesh Zipper Storage Bag Dimensions: 23.5 cm × 17.5 cm (9.25 in × 6.88 in) This sleek, semi-transparent mesh bag keeps everything visible, tidy, and easy to grab on the go. Lightweight yet durable, it zips closed to secure all your essentials in one place. Whether tossed in a suitcase or slipped into a backpack, it's designed to travel as effortlessly as you do. 3D Blackout Sleeping Mask Dimensions: 21 cm × 8 cm (8.27 in × 3.15 in) Enjoy deep rest wherever you roam with this 3D-contoured sleeping mask. The ergonomic shape provides full blackout coverage without touching your eyes -no pressure, no smudged makeup. Made from ultra-soft, hypoallergenic materials and completely fragrance-free, it’s designed for comfort even on the longest journeys. Disposable Toilet Seat Covers (3 pcs) Compact and travel-ready, these waterproof toilet seat covers are a must for public restrooms. Hygienic and easy to use, they provide a barrier between you and the seat for peace of mind when you're on the go. Each one is folded small to fit neatly in your kit without taking up space. 30ml Mini Travel Bottle A compact, reusable bottle perfect for shampoo, conditioner, body wash, or any liquid essential. The secure screw cap keeps everything leak-free while you travel. Its 30ml size makes it carry-on friendly and ideal for short getaways or gym bags. Skynlab Premium Toothpaste (12g) Maintain good oral health and eliminate bad breath with this premium herbal toothpaste. Formulated by Skynlab, it blends organic and plant-based ingredients to deliver a refreshing clean while supporting gum and tooth health. The 12g tube is perfect for travel and daily use on the go. Mini Pill Case Dimensions: 3 x 5 x 1.5 cm (1.18 in x 1.97 in x 0.59 in) This compact and portable pill case is the perfect storage solution for your daily vitamins, medications, or supplements. Small enough to fit in your pocket or bag, it keeps everything secure and organised, so you can take your essentials wherever you go. Nail Care Tools Cuticle Pusher Dimensions: 9 cm (3.54 in) A glittery plastic cuticle pusher that gently pushes back cuticles, ensuring a clean, smooth nail edge for a polished look. Mini Nail File Dimensions: 8.5 cm x 1.2 cm (3.35 in x 0.47 in) This mini file helps shape and smooth nails to perfection, with a compact size that fits easily into your travel kit. Nail Buffer Dimensions: 3.5 cm x 2.5 cm x 1 cm (1.38 in x 0.98 in x 0.39 in) Achieve salon-quality shine with this convenient buffer, designed to smooth and brighten nails with ease. Hair Comb Dimensions: 18 cm (7.1 in) This sleek, lightweight comb is perfect for detangling and smoothing your hair on the go. Its compact size makes it easy to carry in your travel kit, while the durable design ensures gentle styling without snagging. Portable Transparent Folding Toothbrush Compact and travel-friendly, this transparent folding toothbrush unfolds easily for on-the-go oral care. Its slim design fits neatly into your kit, while the durable bristles ensure a thorough clean wherever you are. Fruit-Flavoured Dental Floss (2 pcs) Enjoy a sweet and refreshing clean with these individually wrapped flosses in grapefruit and grape flavours. Each piece provides a gentle yet effective way to remove food particles, leaving your mouth feeling fresh while on the go. Moisturising Hand Soap Strips These alcohol-free moisturising hand soap strips are gently scented with a warm spice fragrance and are suitable for all skin types. Each strip dissolves quickly in water, leaving your hands feeling soft and refreshed. The box itself comes in a random colour, making this a fun and functional travel essential for work, study, or on-the-go use. Disposable Compressed Towels (2 pcs) Dimensions (Package): 5.2 cm x 2.5 cm (2.05 in x 0.98 in) Dimensions (Expanded): 20 cm x 22 cm (7.8 in x 8.66 in) These unscented, alcohol-free disposable towels are compact and perfect for on-the-go hygiene. Each towel comes in a small, easy-to-carry package that expands when water is added, giving you a fresh, soft towel whenever you need it. Ideal for travel, work, or study, they offer a convenient and hygienic solution for a quick clean-up. Safety Warning For external use only
